episodes.title: Aftermath
episodes.plot: Miguel's fighting for his life, Robby's missing, and Daniel and Johnny's reputations are in tatters as the community reacts to the West Valley brawl.

episodes.title: Nature vs. Nurture
episodes.plot: Daniel and Johnny team up to find Robby. Miguel faces an uncertain future. Kreese tries to bring Tory back to Cobra Kai.

episodes.title: Now You're Gonna Pay
episodes.plot: Daniel's tarnished public image takes a toll on his sales, leading to a takeover offer. Johnny tries to raise money for Miguel's surgery.

episodes.title: The Right Path
episodes.plot: Following an important meeting in Japan, Daniel revisits Mr. Miyagi's hometown in Okinawa. Johnny attempts to reconnect with Robby.

episodes.title: Miyagi-Do
episodes.plot: In Okinawa, Daniel spends time with an old friend - and an old enemy, who has much to teach him. The dueling dojos' rivalry comes to a nasty head.

episodes.title: King Cobra
episodes.plot: Miguel helps Johnny craft the perfect social media message. Kreese scouts new recruits while Daniel and Amanda try to shut down Cobra Kai.

episodes.title: Obstáculos
episodes.plot: Daniel spends some father-daughter time with a traumatized Sam, Johnny plans to form a new karate dojo but struggles to come up with a cool name.

episodes.title: The Good, The Bad, and the Badass
episodes.plot: Informed that this year's All Valley Karate Tournament is being canceled, the three competing sensei attend a city council meeting to save it.

episodes.title: Feel the Night
episodes.plot: It's Christmastime in the Valley, and romance is in the air. Daniel and Miguel find unexpected common ground, and the Cobra Kai recruits go on a mission.

episodes.title: December 19
episodes.plot: Old wounds begin to heal at a country club Christmas party, but a brutal assault by Kreese's students leads to new betrayals and alliances.
